meanings.definition: The quality of being easily digested.
meanings.sent1: The digestibilities of certain foods vary depending on their fiber content.
meanings.sent2: Nutritionists consider the digestibilities of different proteins when planning diets.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that his new recipe had such high digestibilities, it would disappear before you knew it!
meanings.sent4: Her explanation had such clear digestibilities that everyone understood immediately.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the importance of fiber in improving digestibilities to his patient.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be digested.
meanings.sent1: The doctor assessed the patient's digestibilities after surgery.
meanings.sent2: The medication was designed to improve the digestibilities of the patient.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity about the new food's digestibilities led to an interesting experiment.
meanings.sent4: The digestibilities of the new supplement were put to the test by the research team.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the concept of digestibilities using simple examples to the students.

meanings.definition: The ability to be broken down and absorbed by the body.
meanings.sent1: The nutritionist emphasized the importance of digestibilities for overall health.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how certain vitamins enhance digestibilities of nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's superpower was the incredible digestibilities of any food he ate.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's performance improved with better digestibilities of the supplements he took.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the digestibilities of different enzymes in the body to understand digestion better.
